duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide exceptional customer service and build professional relationships with customers.
Identify referral opportunities and engage customers in meaningful conversations to understand their financial needs.
Resolve customer concerns in a timely and professional manner, escalating issues when necessary.
Facilitate account transactions accurately and efficiently, while adhering to bank policy and procedures.
Maintain good punctuality, attendance, and participate in continuous learning and training.
Open new accounts as needed and recommend suitable products and services to meet customer needs.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent required; bachelor degree preferred. Knowledge of and experience with bank products, online banking, mobile banking applications, banking cards, etc. preferred.
